name: Kenki Ippatsu! Shovel Master ni Narou!
overview: Kenki Ippatsu! Shovel Master Ninarou! is an advanced version of Dirt Jockey adding new features like beginners mode, practice mode and also a difficulty level setting. The most important new features are the Master Course for the most advanced players and there is also a new operation pattern switching of the shovel using the Analog Sticks as an alternate controller, which was requested from many users in the previous game to make it even more realistic.
